FuncDef:
The qos-profile command binds a QoS template to the value-added service template.
The undo qos-profile command cancels the binding relationship between the QoS template and the value-added service template.
By default, the QoS template is not bound to the value-added service template.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the QoS template.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The qos-profile command is used to bind a QoS template to the value-added service template.
Prerequisites
The following tasks should be complete before you use the qos-profile command:
Configuring a value-added service template (BOD service).Configuring a QoS template.

Configuration Impact
The configuration of the bound QoS template is used to restrict bandwidth of the BOD service.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
The command can be configured only for the BOD service.
The command cannot be configured while the qos-profile is in time-range mode.
The command cannot be configured while the qos-profile is in 8cos-enhance mode.
